thread.title: Newt Gingrich returns to Fox News
thread.title_full: Newt Gingrich returns to Fox News | Washington Examiner

author: Eddie Scarry
title: Newt Gingrich returns to Fox News
text:
In a 2013 authorized biography on Roger Ailes, the Fox News CEO is quoted as calling former House Speaker and Fox contributor Newt Gingrich a "prick" and a "sore loser."
Despite these tough words, Politico reported on Friday that Gingrich has returned to Fox as a contributor after a two-year stint with CNN.
Gingrich was a contributor with Fox prior to his unsuccessful run for the Republican presidential nomination in 2012. The network severed ties with him, as is policy, and as the primary wore on, Gingrich turned to criticizing Fox as biased in favor of eventual GOP nominee Mitt Romney.
"I think Fox has been for Romney all the way through," Gingrich said in April 2012, according to Real Clear Politics.
  Job growth disappoints at 142,000 in September, unemployment rate 5.1 percent Following August's disappointing 173k mark, economists had expected a rebound to 203k new payroll jobs.
By Joseph Lawler â€¢ 10/02/15 8:31 AM A spokesperson for Fox did not return a request for comment from the Washington Examiner media desk.
